quote: Better the cottage where one is merry than the palace where one weeps. – Chinese Proverb
fact: In eighteenth-century English gambling dens, there was an employee whose only job was to swallow the dice if there was a police raid.
joke:
What is the difference between ignorance and apathy?

I don't know and I don't care.
